Filter sources

Source: R/XGR.R
XGR.filter_sources.Rd

Identify the sources with the most annotations in the locus. Then only keep these sources.

XGR.filter_sources(gr.lib, n_top_sources = 5)

See also

Other XGR: DT_to_GRanges(), GRanges_to_BED(), XGR.download_and_standardize(), XGR.enrichment_bootstrap(), XGR.enrichment_plot(), XGR.enrichment(), XGR.filter_assays(), XGR.import_annotations(), XGR.iterate_enrichment(), XGR.iterate_overlap(), XGR.merge_and_process(), XGR.plot_enrichment(), XGR.plot_peaks(), XGR.prepare_foreground_background()
